title: Elephants and Corpses
description: The corpse-jumping body mercenary Nev is used to filling other people's shoes. When his assistant Tera recognizes the most recent waterlogged cadaver they bought off the street, though, he finds that his new body is carrying more trouble than he bargained for.At the Publisher's request, this title is being sold without Digital Rights Management Software (DRM) applied.
author: Kameron Hurley
